creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: variously enamelled with famille rose ladies, children and sages beside pavilions on terraces; borders pierced with H-pattern (has become known as Rockefeller pattern after the late Governor Nelson Rockefeller, who possessed a particularly fine and complete service); .2 man with neck yolk over shoulder, three other figures
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
title: Pair of dessert plates
